name: Arcade Baseball!
description:
Arcade Baseball

A pinball Baseball game that scores base hit by where the ball hits the top of the screen.  You have three outs to score the most runs you can. 

This game was written for the C64 Cassette 50 charity competition. All the code and data has to reside below $1000 in memory. It is only playable online until after the competition.

Controls

Joystick in port 2
Press the button to pitch and move the joystick in any direction to swing the bat.
